messages.subject: Japan Ex
messages.msgSnippet: Dear All This may be of interest to you. On 21st July at the Excel Centre in London s Docklands, there will be a Japan exposition. My understanding is that it
messages.messageBody:
Dear All
This may be of interest to you. On 21st July at the Excel Centre in London's Docklands, there will be a Japan exposition. My understanding is that it will cater for all things Japanese, including modern and cultural. Certainly there is Manga, Anime etc and I will be manning a stand for To-ken Society of GB. This will feature swords and armour, mostly from my own collection so if you come, please say hello.
Details may be found on www.To-ken.com in the Members section.
Regards
Clive sinclaire

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
